summary: Dividends are one of the best benefits to being a shareholder, but finding a great dividend stock is no easy task. Does Northern Trust (NTRS) have what it takes? Let's find out.

headline: Fieldpoint Private Trust Appoints Brian Donovan as President, Family Office
summary: GREENWICH, Conn., September 09, 2025--Fieldpoint Private Trust appoints Brian Donovan as President, Family Office, adding 30 years of wealth planning expertise and leadership.

headline: Fieldpoint Private Trust Appoints Shirley Posada as Senior Relationship Manager
summary: GREENWICH, Conn., September 09, 2025--Fieldpoint Private Trust announced the appointment of Shirley Posada as Senior Relationship Manager, further strengthening the firm’s client advisory and fiduciary capabilities as it continues to expand its premier family office platform.

headline: Absolute Climate and Northern Trust Offer Capabilities to Support Independent Certification and Lifecycle Management for Digital Carbon Credits
summary: Project developers can now use Absolute Climate’s independent quality assurance platform to record and settle credits through The Northern Trust Carbon Ecosystem™SAN FRANCISCO and CHICAGO, Sept. 09, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Absolute Climate, the first independent quality assurance provider built to serve the entire carbon removal industry, and Northern Trust (Nasdaq: NTRS) are offering capabilities that support access to regulated credit issuance.
